Title: Fathers and Sons
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Jeffrey Nachmanoff, Gwen Sigan (executive story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: While undercover, Ruzek discovers his father is working for a suspected drug dealer and is forced to question if his dad is involved.
